channel.title: Mentoring on Sustainable Community Development Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Mentoring on Sustainable Community Development Hub

item.title: Be a Mentor
item.description: The value of one to one training cannot be overstated. Please describe the area of mentoring that you feel you would be most valuable to a young learner. Please update here on scdhub so that it reflects your skillset so that potential learners can connect with you directly. The SCD Hub is here as a network of people and organizations working collectively to provide structure and support for technical mentoring relationships.
